channel.title: Compiler
channel.description:
I have java but it says it could not find the path specified. [code]@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java pause[/code] That's the compiler code. It's a source that is like "Bin" and "Scr" and stuff. Help plox.
What do I need to use this compiler. Or, what can I replace it with?

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:45, topic:352889”]You mean like

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause
Correct[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

deathschaos9:

I don’t understand what you’re asking.

@echo off
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_19\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src\server\model\players\Quests\*.java src\server\model\players\Content\*.java
pause

A compiler just like that, but instead of going to all of those, the paths/folders are “java” and “class”

Read full topic

My Computer>HP_PAVILON(C:)>JDK>BIN>JAVA
So that’s where it is. I put my cursor over it:

Description: Java™Platform SE Binary
Company: Sun Microsystems, Inc.
File Version: 6.0.170.4

If you haven’t noticed by now, I’m pretty fricking retarded when it comes to this crap.
Sorry >.>

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

3 out of 26 replies actually went towards helping this guy, yours almost helped. Two of the reasons your snippet probably didn’t work is because his server uses MINA and Jython, and his server is packaged, both of which have to be defined in the compiler or it wont work.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“RS Gamer001, post:21, topic:352889”][quote author=Da Vinci link=topic=449204.msg3295822#msg3295822 date=1280936267]

I love you too.

You will love me now.
Simple version:

@echo off TITLE Compiling "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
Change 20 to whatever version of Java you have.

If you have Windows Vista make it:

@echo off TITLE Compiling "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause
with the (x86) I believe.

Hope I helped!
~Leo.
[/quote]

The one I posted was a 508 one… you posted a 317 and lower one…[/quote]

THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS A 508 COMPILER OR A 317 ON THAT NOTE IT’S CALLED THE JAVA COMPILER BECAUSE IT COMPILES JAVA SOURCE CODE.

  • Ends rage.

Read full topic
